title: Which essay writing services are scams? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depending on how you want to define scam the answer is all of them. These services know that the moment you put your name on their essay you have just committed plagiarism. Plagiarism can get you expelled. The consequences are so dire and these services know full well what the consequences are. But here is the best reason to never purchase anything from them. They figure if you are so foolish to buy an essay from them you are not worthy of their concern when you get caught.

The same way that you set out searching for the best possible essay service online, is the same way that you will find the worst scam services online. Unlike the best services online, scam services do not advertise themselves as scam artists. In order to draw in bigger prey, these services advertise themselves as the best services online.
